form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Hatch (for himself and Mrs. Feinstein) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit threats against former Vice Presidents and members of their families, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Former Vice President Protection Improvement Act of 2015.
Section 879 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (2), (3), and (4) as paragraphs (3), (4), and (5), respectively; and
by inserting after paragraph (1) the following:

paragraph.text: a former Vice President or a member of the immediate family of a former Vice President;

clause.text: by striking subsection (a)(1) and inserting paragraphs (1) and (2) of subsection (a); and
by inserting or former Vice President after former President each place it appears; and

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (B), by striking subsection (a)(2) and (a)(3) and inserting paragraphs (3) and (4) of subsection (a).
